parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The data sources for the media pipeline. (dict) --- Structure that contains the settings for media stream sources. The type of media stream source. The ARN of the meeting.

nested_params.name: SourceType
nested_params.description: The type of media stream source.

parameters.name: Sinks
parameters.description: The data sink for the media pipeline. (dict) --- Structure that contains the settings for a media stream sink. The ARN of the Kinesis Video Stream pool returned by the  CreateMediaPipelineKinesisVideoStreamPool API. The media stream sink's type. Specifies the number of streams that the sink can accept. The media stream sink's media stream type.

nested_params.name: SinkArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the Kinesis Video Stream pool returned by the  CreateMediaPipelineKinesisVideoStreamPool API.

nested_params.name: ReservedStreamCapacity
nested_params.description: Specifies the number of streams that the sink can accept.

nested_params.name: MediaStreamType
nested_params.description: The media stream sink's media stream type.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The token assigned to the client making the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags assigned to the media pipeline. (dict) --- A key/value pair that grants users access to meeting resources. The key half of a tag. The value half of a tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key half of a tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value half of a tag.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineId
nested_items.description: The ID of the media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: MediaPipelineArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the media stream pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the media stream pipeline was updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the media stream pipeline.

nested_items.name: Sources
nested_items.description: The media stream pipeline's data sources.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of media stream source.

nested_items.name: Sinks
nested_items.description: The media stream pipeline's data sinks.

nested_items.name: SinkArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Kinesis Video Stream pool returned by the  CreateMediaPipelineKinesisVideoStreamPool API.

nested_items.name: ReservedStreamCapacity
nested_items.description: Specifies the number of streams that the sink can accept.

nested_items.name: MediaStreamType
nested_items.description: The media stream sink's media stream type.
